alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:57PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Albany County through 345 PM MDT... At 257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rock River, or 33 miles northwest of Laramie, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock River and Wheatland Reservoir 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range
